long_description: The Burley 2-Wheel Stroller kit lets converts your Burley trailer into a stroller, letting you bring your kid along on sidewalk strolls, walks through the park, or trips to the zoo. 2 pivoting wheels mount quickly to your compatible Burley trailer (sold separately) , supporting the front end of the trailer and allowing easy maneuverability. Comes with 2 wheels with support arms and a convenient storage bag. Compatible with the following Burley products (sold separately): 2007 - current D'Lite, Solo, or Encore; 2013 Cub; 2008 - current Tail Wagon.
short_description: The Burley 2-Wheel Stroller kit lets converts your Burley trailer into a stroller, letting you bring your kid along on sidewalk strolls, walks through the park, or trips to the zoo.
